text: Lisa Marie Smith (born December 5, 1968) is an American actress and model. Marie is known for being in a relationship with Tim Burton and for being in some of his movies. Marie went on to appear briefly in Let's Get Lost, and had a small role in Woody Allen's movie Alice. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Models from New Jersey
title: Lisa Marie (actress)
